name: orbit-encoder
description: ORBIT-ENCODER is an utility library for Data Compression and Encoding. It can take whatever object you give him as argument and returns a compressed encoded string. It provides a decoding method too. It uses a modified version of LZString for UTF16 Compression.

scripts.xversion: npm run format && npm --no-git-tag-version version minor
scripts.gitupdate: git add . && git commit -m "ðŸŸ¢ RELEASING V %npm_package_version% âœ¨" && git push origin main --tags
scripts.release: npm run xversion && npm run gitupdate && npm publish

author: Orbit Turner
